## ChildRemovedEvent interface

When one child is removed to a child list, it's emitted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ChildRemovedEvent<T> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [children](./treex.js.childremovedevent.children.md) | ReadonlyArray&lt;[TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; |  |
|  [node](./treex.js.childremovedevent.node.md) | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A node which a removed node belonged to. |
|  [oldChildren](./treex.js.childremovedevent.oldchildren.md) | ReadonlyArray&lt;[TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | A old child list which contains a removed node. |
|  [oldIndex](./treex.js.childremovedevent.oldindex.md) | number | A old index of a removed node. |
|  [REMOVED](./treex.js.childremovedevent.removed.md) | "REMOVED" | To distinguish other events, existence of this property is checked. |
|  [removedNode](./treex.js.childremovedevent.removednode.md) | [TreeNode](./treex.js.treenode.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | A removed node. |
